grandiose.answer: characterized by affectation of splendor or by exaggeration

conciliate.answer: to make more friendly or less angry

panache.answer: dash or flamboyance in style and action

assiduous.answer: showing great care, attention, and effort

umbrage.answer: a feeling of being offended at what someone has said or done

succint.answer: giving the gist of something without excessive words

fauna.answer: the animals of a given region or period considered as a whole.
